Module org.nasdanika.html.bootstrap
Package org.nasdanika.html.bootstrap

Interface ActionGroup

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BootstrapElement<Tag,​ActionGroup>, Markup, NamedItemsContainer, Producer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionGroupImpl
    public interface ActionGroup
extends BootstrapElement<Tag,​ActionGroup>, NamedItemsContainer
    Interface for building List groups with actions - div container, link elements.
    Author:
    Pavel Vlasov

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Tag action​(boolean active, boolean disabled, Color color, Object href, Object... name)  
      Container asContainer​(boolean fluid)
      Creates a container with a single row and two columns - one with the action group div and the other with the content div.
      Tag contentAction​(Object name, boolean active, boolean disabled, Color color, Object contentId, Object... content)
      Creates a content action, similar to navs.
      Tag getContentDiv()
      ActionGroup toHTMLElement() returns the div containing action links.

      • getContentDiv

        Tag getContentDiv()
        ActionGroup toHTMLElement() returns the div containing action links. Content div shall be output either using this method or asContainer().
        Returns:

      • asContainer

        Container asContainer​(boolean fluid)
        Creates a container with a single row and two columns - one with the action group div and the other with the content div.
